level.text: A party shall notify DCRA if the dispute is settled after the filing and before the decision is rendered.
The DCRA shall verify the terms of the settlement and the date for performance agreed upon, if applicable, and shall obtain a statement of settlement signed by the parties.
Upon receipt of a properly executed settlement, the arbitrator(s) shall enter an order on the basis of the settlement. The order shall indicate the terms of the settlement.
The settlement order shall be sent by certified mail to each party.
The settlement order shall constitute an order of the Board for purposes of ยง4(r) of the Act.
